author: senh
title: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year
text: BING NEWS: Comedian-filmmaker Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year LOS ANGELES, Calif. – Chris Rock is coming back to host the Oscars for a second time. The show’s producers say the prolific comedian-filmmaker will be at the helm for the 88th Academy Awards on Feb. 28.
